short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: An extension that helps to speedup the research process and maintains a list of interesting papers on the fly.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This research toolkit will help researchers to maintain a list of useful resources that they may access later on for further study. Items can be added to the list directly or through the right-click context menu. It currently performs three operations,
i) Add selected resource text to the list through popup input field or right-click.
ii) Read out any text from a webpage
iii) Search any keyword(s) for relevant papers on IEEExplore through just a right click.

For persistence it uses the browser's local storage so that the user can access his/her resource list after restarting the browser. It has script for Ajax script to communicate data with the server are currently disabled as there isn't any server to respond.
